superiorfrontal.name: Superior Frontal Gyrus
superiorfrontal.clinical: Damage may cause executive dysfunction, personality changes

inferiorfrontal.name: Inferior Frontal Gyrus
inferiorfrontal.clinical: Damage causes Broca aphasia, difficulty with speech production

precentral.name: Precentral Gyrus
precentral.function: Primary motor cortex, voluntary movement control
precentral.clinical: Damage causes paralysis or weakness on opposite side of body

postcentral.name: Postcentral Gyrus
postcentral.function: Primary somatosensory cortex, touch and proprioception
postcentral.clinical: Damage causes loss of sensation on opposite side of body
